column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Visited this morning for the first time. The baked goods are great but this place is a study in inefficiency. It took me 40 minutes to get 3 pastries
column2: a baguette and an iced coffee. The irony is that the staff actually seems to be working hard but they are so inefficient they aren't accomplishing anything. Seriously
column3: this place makes the post office look efficient.
